monthly_manager_non_oil_standard_bonus = #{monthlyManagerNonOilStandardBonus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
total_monthly_manager_bonus = #{totalMonthlyManagerBonus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
monthly_sale_oil_bonus = #{monthlySaleOilBonus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
monthly_non_sale_oil_bonus = #{monthlyNonSaleOilBonus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
current_month_oil_bonus = #{currentMonthOilBonus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
current_month_non_oil_bonus = #{currentMonthNonOilBonus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
safeguard_procedures = #{safeguardProcedures,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
current_month_payable_oil_bonus = #{currentMonthPayableOilBonus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
station_accountant_data_one = #{stationAccountantDataOne,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
station_accountant_data_two = #{stationAccountantDataTwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
station_accountant_base_bonus = #{stationAccountantBaseBonus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
accountant_bonus_station_type = #{accountantBonusStationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
performance_challenge_bonus = #{performanceChallengeBonus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
station_staff_num_and_admin = #{stationStaffNumAndAdmin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
boarder_subsidies = #{boarderSubsidies,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
managerial_position_population = #{managerialPositionPopulation,jdbcType=INTEGER},
managerial_position_real_population = #{managerialPositionRealPopulation,jdbcType=INTEGER},
managerial_position_count_base_one = #{managerialPositionCountBaseOne,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
managerial_position_count_base_two = #{managerialPositionCountBaseTwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
managerial_position_count_base_three = #{managerialPositionCountBaseThree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
managerial_position_count_base_four = #{managerialPositionCountBaseFour,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
base_target = #{baseTarget,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
challenge_target = #{challengeTarget,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
base_bonus = #{baseBonus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
challenge_bonus = #{challengeBonus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
current_month_bonus = #{currentMonthBonus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
station_code = #{stationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_code = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
staff_code = #{staffCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
duty_code = #{dutyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
district_code = #{districtCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
food_way = #{foodWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
boarder_subsidies_remark = #{boarderSubsidiesRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_oil_standard_rate_artificial = #{isOilStandardRateArtificial,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_non_oil_standard_rate_artificial = #{isNonOilStandardRateArtificial,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
accommodation_subsidy = #{accommodationSubsidy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
is_accommo_subsidy_arti = #{isAccommoSubsidyArti,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update biz_station_target set station_staff_num = #{stationStaffNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, station_staff_num_float = #{stationStaffNumFloat,jdbcType=INTEGER}, station_level_code = #{stationLevelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mmp = #{mmp,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, nps = #{nps,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, oil_target_volume = #{oilTargetVolume,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, oil_real_volume = #{oilRealVolume,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, oil_day_average_volume = #{oilDayAverageVolume,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, non_oil_target_volume = #{nonOilTargetVolume,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, non_oil_real_volume = #{nonOilRealVolume,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, non_oil_day_average_volume = #{nonOilDayAverageVolume,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, store_mark_score = #{storeMarkScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, store_manage_score = #{storeManageScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sys_create_time = #{sysCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sys_update_time = #{sysUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gasoline_target_volume = #{gasolineTargetVolume,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, diesel_target_volume = #{dieselTargetVolume,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, gasoline_day_average_volume = #{gasolineDayAverageVolume,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, diesel_day_average_volume = #{dieselDayAverageVolume,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, is_keep_dormitory = #{isKeepDormitory,jdbcType=CHAR}, dormitory_subsidies = #{dormitorySubsidies,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, monthly_store_allowance = #{monthlyStoreAllowance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, oil_standard_rate = #{oilStandardRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, non_oil_standard_rate = #{nonOilStandardRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, direct_selling_bonus = #{directSellingBonus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, upper_limit = #{upperLimit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, mmp_coefficient = #{mmpCoefficient,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, nps_coefficient = #{npsCoefficient,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, weighting_coefficient = #{weightingCoefficient,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, monthly_manager_bonus = #{monthlyManagerBonus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, monthly_manager_oil_standard_bonus = #{monthlyManagerOilStandardBonus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, monthly_manager_non_oil_standard_bonus = #{monthlyManagerNonOilStandardBonus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_monthly_manager_bonus = #{totalMonthlyManagerBonus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, monthly_sale_oil_bonus = #{monthlySaleOilBonus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, monthly_non_sale_oil_bonus = #{monthlyNonSaleOilBonus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, current_month_oil_bonus = #{currentMonthOilBonus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, current_month_non_oil_bonus = #{currentMonthNonOilBonus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, safeguard_procedures = #{safeguardProcedures,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, current_month_payable_oil_bonus = #{currentMonthPayableOilBonus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, station_accountant_data_one = #{stationAccountantDataOne,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, station_accountant_data_two = #{stationAccountantDataTwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, station_accountant_base_bonus = #{stationAccountantBaseBonus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, accountant_bonus_station_type = #{accountantBonusStationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, performance_challenge_bonus = #{performanceChallengeBonus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, station_staff_num_and_admin = #{stationStaffNumAndAdmin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, boarder_subsidies = #{boarderSubsidies,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, managerial_position_population = #{managerialPositionPopulation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, managerial_position_real_population = #{managerialPositionRealPopulation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, managerial_position_count_base_one = #{managerialPositionCountBaseOne,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, managerial_position_count_base_two = #{managerialPositionCountBaseTwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, managerial_position_count_base_three = #{managerialPositionCountBaseThree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, managerial_position_count_base_four = #{managerialPositionCountBaseFour,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, base_target = #{baseTarget,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, challenge_target = #{challengeTarget,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, base_bonus = #{baseBonus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, challenge_bonus = #{challengeBonus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, current_month_bonus = #{currentMonthBonus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, station_code = #{stationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_code = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, staff_code = #{staffCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, duty_code = #{dutyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, district_code = #{districtCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, food_way = #{foodWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, boarder_subsidies_remark = #{boarderSubsidiesRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_oil_standard_rate_artificial = #{isOilStandardRateArtificial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_non_oil_standard_rate_artificial = #{isNonOilStandardRateArtificial,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from biz_station_target tt,biz_station st,biz_district dt where tt.station_code = st.station_code and st.district_code = dt.district_code
and station_code = #{stationCode}
and tt.year_month = '${yearMonth}'
and dt.district_code = '${districtCode}'

select top ${pageSize} tt.*,
(case when tt.non_oil_standard_rate != 0 then non_oil_standard_rate*100 else 0 end) as non_oil_standard_rate, (case when tt.oil_standard_rate != 0 then oil_standard_rate*100 else 0 end) as oil_standard_rate from biz_station_target tt,biz_station st,biz_district dt
tt.station_code = st.station_code and st.district_code = dt.district_code and tt.id not in (select top ${startIndex} ttt.id from biz_station_target as ttt,biz_station st0,biz_district dt0 where ttt.station_code = st0.station_code and st0.district_code = dt0.district_code
and ttt.station_code = '${searchVO.stationCode}'
and ttt.year_month = '${searchVO.yearMonth}'
and dt0.district_code = '${searchVO.districtCode}'
)
and tt.station_code = '${searchVO.stationCode}'
and tt.year_month = '${searchVO.yearMonth}'
and dt.district_code = '${searchVO.districtCode}'

select count(*) from biz_station_target
year_month = '${yearMonth}'

select top ${pageSize} *, (select station_name from biz_station where station_code = tt.station_code) station_name from (select * from biz_station_target) as tt
tt.id not in (select top ${startIndex} id from (select * from biz_station_target) as ttt
ttt.year_month = '${yearMonth}'
order by ttt.year_month desc)
and tt.year_month = '${yearMonth}'
order by tt.year_month desc

SELECT t1.station_code, t1.station_name, t2.id, t2.store_manage_score, t2.store_mark_score, t2.year_month, t2.sys_create_time, t2.sys_update_time FROM biz_station t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN biz_station_target t2 ON t1.station_code = t2.station_code and t2.year_month = '${yearMonth}';

SELECT top ${pageSize} *, (SELECT station_name FROM biz_station WHERE station_code = tt.station_code) station_name, (SELECT station_level_name FROM biz_station_level WHERE station_level_code = tt.station_level_code ) station_level_name, (SELECT district_name FROM biz_district WHERE district_code = tt.district_code) district_name FROM (select * from biz_station_target) as tt
tt.id not in (select top ${startIndex} id from (select * from biz_station_target) as ttt
ttt.year_month = '${yearMonth}'
order by ttt.year_month desc)
and tt.year_month = '${yearMonth}'
order by tt.year_month desc

SELECT t1.station_code, t1.station_level_code, t2.id, t2.mmp, t2.nps, t1.station_name, t2.year_month, t2.sys_create_time, t2.sys_update_time, (SELECT station_level_name FROM biz_station_level t3 where t3.station_level_code = t2.station_level_code) station_level_name FROM biz_station t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN biz_station_target t2 ON t1.station_code = t2.station_code and t2.year_month = '${yearMonth}';

select top ${pageSize} *, (select station_name from biz_station where station_code = tt.station_code) station_name from (select * from biz_station_target) as tt
tt.id not in (select top ${startIndex} id from (select * from biz_station_target) as ttt
ttt.year_month = '${yearMonth}'
order by ttt.year_month desc)
and tt.year_month = '${yearMonth}'
order by tt.year_month desc

SELECT t1.station_code, t1.station_name, t2.id, t2.station_staff_num, t2.station_staff_num_float, t2.year_month, t2.sys_create_time, t2.sys_update_time FROM biz_station t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN biz_station_target t2 ON t1.station_code = t2.station_code and t2.year_month = '${yearMonth}';

select top ${pageSize} *, (select station_name from biz_station where station_code = tt.station_code) station_name, (select station_level_name from biz_station_level where station_level_code = tt.station_level_code ) station_level_name, (select area_name from biz_area where area_code = tt.area_code) area_name from (select * from biz_station_target) as tt
tt.id not in (select top ${startIndex} id from (select * from biz_station_target) as ttt
ttt.year_month = '${yearMonth}'
order by ttt.year_month desc)
and tt.year_month = '${yearMonth}'
order by tt.year_month desc

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM biz_station_target
year_month = '${yearMonth}'
SELECT t1.* FROM biz_station_target t1, biz_staff t2 WHERE t1.staff_code = t2.staff_code AND t1.year_month = '${yearMonth}' ORDER BY t1.year_month DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) from biz_station_target as tt,biz_station st,biz_district dt where tt.station_code = st.station_code and st.district_code = dt.district_code
and st.district_code = '${districtCode}'
and tt.year_month = '${yearMonth}'

SELECT top ${pageSize} tt.*, st.station_name, (SELECT station_level_name FROM biz_station_level WHERE station_level_code = tt.station_level_code ) station_level_name, dt.district_name FROM biz_station_target as tt,biz_station st,biz_district dt
tt.station_code = st.station_code and st.district_code = dt.district_code and tt.id not in (SELECT top ${startIndex} ttt.id FROM biz_station_target as ttt,biz_station st,biz_district dt where ttt.station_code = st.station_code and st.district_code = dt.district_code
and dt.district_code = '${districtCode}'
and ttt.year_month = '${yearMonth}'
)
and dt.district_code = '${districtCode}'
and tt.year_month = '${yearMonth}'

SELECT t1.district_code, t3.district_name, t1.area_code, t1.station_code, t2.station_level_code, t2.id, t2.mmp, t2.nps, t1.station_name, t2.year_month, t2.sys_create_time, t2.sys_update_time, (SELECT station_level_name FROM biz_station_level t3 where t3.station_level_code = t2.station_level_code) station_level_name FROM biz_district t3, biz_station t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN biz_station_target t2 ON t1.station_code = t2.station_code and t2.year_month = '${yearMonth}' WHERE t1.district_code = t3.district_code
and t1.district_code = '${districtCode}'
ORDER BY t2.year_month DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) from biz_station_target tt,biz_station st,biz_district dt where tt.station_code = st.station_code and st.district_code = dt.district_code
and dt.district_code = '${districtCode}'
and tt.year_month = '${yearMonth}'

SELECT top ${pageSize} tt.*, st.station_name, dt.district_name FROM biz_station_target tt,biz_station st,biz_district dt
tt.station_code = st.station_code and st.district_code = dt.district_code and tt.id not in (SELECT top ${startIndex} ttt.id FROM biz_station_target ttt,biz_station st0,biz_district dt0 where ttt.station_code = st0.station_code and st0.district_code = dt0.district_code
and dt0.district_code = '${districtCode}'
and ttt.year_month = '${yearMonth}'
)
and dt.district_code = '${districtCode}'
and tt.year_month = '${yearMonth}'

SELECT t1.district_code,t3.district_name, t1.station_code, t2.id, t2.store_mark_score, t2.store_manage_score, t1.station_name, t2.year_month, t2.sys_create_time, t2.sys_update_time FROM biz_district t3, biz_station t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN biz_station_target t2 ON t1.station_code = t2.station_code and t2.year_month = '${yearMonth}' WHERE t1.district_code = t3.district_code
and t1.district_code = '${districtCode}'

SELECT COUNT(*) from biz_station_target tt,biz_station st where tt.station_code = st.station_code
and st.district_code = '${districtCode}'
and tt.year_month = '${yearMonth}'

SELECT top ${pageSize} tt.station_staff_num_float, tt.year_month, (SELECT station_name FROM biz_station WHERE station_code = tt.station_code) station_name, (SELECT station_staff_num FROM biz_station WHERE station_code = tt.station_code) station_staff_num, (SELECT district_name FROM biz_district WHERE district_code = tt.district_code) district_name FROM (SELECT * FROM biz_station_target) as tt
tt.id not in (SELECT top ${startIndex} id FROM (SELECT * FROM biz_station_target) as ttt
ttt.district_code = '${districtCode}'
and ttt.year_month = '${yearMonth}'
ttt.year_month = '${yearMonth}'
ORDER BY ttt.year_month)
and tt.district_code = '${districtCode}'
and tt.year_month = '${yearMonth}'
and tt.year_month = '${yearMonth}'
ORDER BY tt.year_month DESC

SELECT top ${pageSize} tt.station_staff_num_float, tt.year_month, st.station_name,tt.station_staff_num FROM biz_station_target tt,biz_station st
tt.station_code = st.station_code and tt.id not in (SELECT top ${startIndex} ttt.id FROM biz_station_target ttt,biz_station st0 where ttt.station_code = st0.station_code
and st0.district_code = '${districtCode}'
and ttt.year_month = '${yearMonth}'
)
and st.district_code = '${districtCode}'
and tt.year_month = '${yearMonth}'

SELECT t1.district_code, t1.station_code, t1.station_level_code, t1.station_name, t1.station_staff_num, t2.id, t2.station_staff_num_float, t2.year_month, t2.sys_create_time, t2.sys_update_time, t3.district_name FROM biz_district t3, biz_station t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN biz_station_target t2 ON t1.station_code = t2.station_code and t2.year_month = '${yearMonth}' WHERE t1.district_code = t3.district_code
and t1.district_code = '${districtCode}'
SELECT * FROM biz_station_target WHERE id in (${ids})

SELECT (SELECT station_name FROM biz_station WHERE station_code = t1.station_code) station_name, (SELECT t2.valueName FROM data_dictionary t2, biz_station t3 WHERE t3.station_code = t1.station_code and t2.valueType = t3.bursar_type) bursar_type, (SELECT station_staff_num FROM biz_station WHERE station_code = t1.station_code) station_staff_num, (SELECT area_name FROM biz_area WHERE area_code = (SELECT area_code FROM biz_station WHERE station_code = t1.station_code)) area_name, (SELECT station_level_name FROM biz_station_level WHERE station_level_code = t1.station_level_code) station_level_name, (SELECT district_name FROM biz_district WHERE district_code = (SELECT district_code FROM biz_station WHERE station_code = t1.station_code)) district_name, (select t2.base_target from biz_challenge_bonus t2 where station_code = t1.station_code and t2.year_month = t1.year_month) base_target, (select t2.base_bonus_amt from biz_challenge_bonus t2 where station_code = t1.station_code and t2.year_month = t1.year_month) base_bonus_amt, (select t2.challenge_target from biz_challenge_bonus t2 where station_code = t1.station_code and t2.year_month = t1.year_month) challenge_target, (select t2.challenge_bonus_amt from biz_challenge_bonus t2 where station_code = t1.station_code and t2.year_month = t1.year_month) challenge_bonus_amt, (select t2.middle_target from biz_challenge_bonus t2 where station_code = t1.station_code and t2.year_month = t1.year_month) middle_target, (select t2.middle_bonus_amt from biz_challenge_bonus t2 where station_code = t1.station_code and t2.year_month = t1.year_month) middle_bonus_amt, (select t2.non_oil_total_amt from biz_challenge_bonus t2 where station_code = t1.station_code and t2.year_month = t1.year_month) non_oil_total_amt, (select t2.plan_day from biz_challenge_bonus t2 where station_code = t1.station_code and t2.year_month = t1.year_month) plan_day, t1.*
FROM biz_station_target t1, biz_station t5 WHERE t1.year_month = '${yearMonth}' and t5.station_code = t1.station_code and t5.district_code = '${districtCode}'

SELECT t5.station_name, dd.valueName as station_type, t5.station_staff_num, area_name, station_level_name , district_name, (case when cb.base_target is null then 0 else cb.base_target end) as base_target, (case when cb.base_bonus_amt is null then 0 else cb.base_bonus_amt end) as base_bonus_amt, (case when cb.challenge_target is null then 0 else cb.challenge_target end) as challenge_target, (case when cb.challenge_bonus_amt is null then 0 else cb.challenge_bonus_amt end) as challenge_bonus_amt,
(case when ncb.base_target is not null then ncb.base_target else 0 end) as non_oil_base_target, (case when ncb.base_bonus_amt is not null then ncb.base_bonus_amt else 0 end) as non_oil_base_bonus_amt, (case when ncb.challenge_target is not null then ncb.challenge_target else 0 end) as non_oil_challenge_target, (case when ncb.challenge_bonus_amt is not null then ncb.challenge_bonus_amt else 0 end) as non_oil_challenge_bonus_amt, t1.* FROM biz_station t5, data_dictionary dd, biz_area ar, biz_district dt, biz_station_target t1 left join biz_challenge_bonus cb on cb.station_code = t1.station_code and t1.year_month = cb.year_month and cb.type = '1' left join biz_challenge_bonus ncb on ncb.station_code = t1.station_code and t1.year_month = ncb.year_month and ncb.type = '0' left join biz_station_level sl on sl.station_level_code = t1.station_level_code where t1.station_code = t5.station_code and dd.valueType = t5.station_type and dd.codeType = 'station_type' and ar.area_code = t5.area_code and dt.district_code = t5.district_code and t1.year_month = '${yearMonth}' and t5.district_code = '${districtCode}'
